021import net.kyori.adventure.platform.bukkit.BukkitAudiences;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.menu.folia.FoliaPlayer;
024import net.tnemc.paper.PaperCore;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.Location;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
029import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
030import org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer;
031
032import java.util.List;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.UUID;
035
036/**
037 * FoliaPlayerProvider
038 *
039 * @author creatorfromhell
040 * @since 0.1.2.0
041 */
042public class FoliaPlayerProvider extends FoliaPlayer implements PlayerProvider {
043
044  private final OfflinePlayer player;
045
046  public FoliaPlayerProvider(final OfflinePlayer player) {
047
048    super(player, PaperCore.instance().getPlugin());
049    this.player = player;
050  }
051
052  public static FoliaPlayerProvider find(final String identifier) {
053
054    try {
055      return new FoliaPlayerProvider(Bukkit.getOfflinePlayer(UUID.fromString(identifier)));
056    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
057      return new FoliaPlayerProvider(Bukkit.getOfflinePlayer(identifier));
058    }
059  }
060
061  /**
062   * Used to get the {@link UUID} of this player.
063   *
064   * @return The {@link UUID} of this player.
065   */
066  @Override
067  public UUID identifier() {
068
069    return player.getUniqueId();
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Used to get the name of this player.
074   *
075   * @return The name of this player.
076   */
077  @Override
078  public String getName() {
079
080    return player.getName();
081  }
082
083  /**
084   * Used to get the location of this player.
085   *
086   * @return The location of this player.
087   */
088  @Override
089  public Optional<Location> getLocation() {
090
091    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
092      return Optional.empty();
093    }
094
095    final org.bukkit.Location locale = player.getPlayer().getLocation();
096
097    return Optional.of(new Location(locale.getWorld().getName(),
098                                    locale.getX(), locale.getY(),
099                                    locale.getZ()
100    ));
101  }
102
103  /**
104   * Used to get the name of the world this player is currently in.
105   *
106   * @return The name of the world.
107   */
108  @Override
109  public String world() {
110
111    String world = TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion();
112
113    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
114      world = player.getPlayer().getWorld().getName();
115    }
116    return world;
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Used to get the name of the biome this player is currently in.
121   *
122   * @return The name of the biome.
123   */
124  @Override
125  public String biome() {
126
127    String biome = TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion();
128
129    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
130      biome = player.getPlayer().getLocation().getBlock().getBiome().getKey().getKey();
131    }
132    return biome;
133  }
134
135  /**
136   * Used to get the amount of experience this player has.
137   *
138   * @return The amount of levels this player has.
139   */
140  @Override
141  public int getExp() {
142
143    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
144      return 0;
145    }
146    return (int)player.getPlayer().getExp();
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Used to set the amount of experience this player has.
151   *
152   * @param exp The amount of experience to set for this player.
153   */
154  @Override
155  public void setExp(final int exp) {
156
157    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
158      player.getPlayer().setTotalExperience(exp);
159    }
160  }
161
162  /**
163   * Used to get the amount of experience levels this player has.
164   *
165   * @return The amount of experience levels this player has.
166   */
167  @Override
168  public int getExpLevel() {
169
170    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
171      return 0;
172    }
173    return player.getPlayer().getLevel();
174  }
175
176  /**
177   * Used to set the amount of experience levels this player has.
178   *
179   * @param level The amount of experience levels to set for this player.
180   */
181  @Override
182  public void setExpLevel(final int level) {
183
184    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
185      player.getPlayer().setLevel(level);
186    }
187  }
188
189  @Override
190  public FoliaInventoryProvider inventory() {
191
192    return new FoliaInventoryProvider(identifier(), PaperCore.instance().getPlugin());
193  }
194
195  @Override
196  public List<String> getEffectivePermissions() {
197
198    return List.of();
199  }
200
201  /**
202   * Used to determine if this player has the specified permission node.
203   *
204   * @param permission The node to check for.
205   *
206   * @return True if the player has the permission, otherwise false.
207   */
208  @Override
209  public boolean hasPermission(final String permission) {
210
211    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
212      return false;
213    }
214    return player.getPlayer().hasPermission(permission);
215  }
216
217  @Override
218  public void message(final String message) {
219
220    if(player.getPlayer() != null) {
221      message(new MessageData(message));
222    }
223  }
224
225  /**
226   * Used to send a message to this command source.
227   *
228   * @param messageData The message data to utilize for this translation.
229   */
230  @Override
231  public void message(final MessageData messageData) {
232
233    if(player.getPlayer() == null) {
234      return;
235    }
236
237    try(final BukkitAudiences provider = BukkitAudiences.create(PaperCore.instance().getPlugin())) {
238      MessageHandler.translate(messageData, player.getUniqueId(), provider.sender(player.getPlayer()));
239    }
240  }
241
242  public OfflinePlayer getPlayer() {
243
244    return player;
245  }
246}
